about_the_game:
Get ready to experience the pure adrenaline of REAL CAR DRIFT RACING, the ultimate racing game that will take you to the wild heart of the Old West! Dominate dusty roads, speed through breathtaking canyons, and conquer the vast prairies in an open world full of adventure and surprises.

Key Features:

Over 100 unique vehicles: Unlock and collect a wide range of cars, each with unique designs and performances, from sleek racing cars to rugged off-roaders ready for any terrain.

Exciting race modes: Test your skills in three different race modes:

Drift: Slide through tight corners and rack up points with spectacular drifts.
Speed: Push the pedal to the metal and leave everyone behind in high-speed races.
Offroad: Tackle rough terrain and environmental challenges in extreme off-road competitions.
Spectacular stunts and action-based scoring: Perform incredible stunts and jumps in the middle of the desert, launch off improvised ramps, and boost your score with daring maneuvers. Every action you take, from a perfect drift to a breathtaking jump, earns you valuable points, helping you climb the leaderboards and unlock exclusive rewards.

Open and explorable world: Explore a vast and detailed open world inspired by the Old West, full of ghost towns, abandoned mines, and stunning natural landscapes. Discover hidden secrets and unique collectibles that will help you upgrade your vehicles and customize your gaming experience.

Progression and customization: As you level up, unlock new charismatic characters and powerful vehicles, along with a wide range of upgrades and customizations to make your driving style truly unique.

Multiplayer and online leaderboards: Challenge players from around the world in thrilling multiplayer races and climb the online leaderboards to prove you're the best driver in the West. Or, perfect your skills in single-player mode by facing increasingly challenging AI opponents.

Stunning graphics and immersive soundtrack: Enjoy breathtaking visuals and an engaging atmosphere thanks to high-quality graphics and a soundtrack that will transport you directly to the Wild West.

Get ready to test your courage and driving skills in an unparalleled racing experience. REAL CAR DRIFT RACING awaits you to write your legend on the roads of the Old West!

Are you ready to become the king of racing in the Wild West? Start your engines and begin your adventure today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Race and drift to gain useful points to unlock and customize more than 100 vehicles! Drive freely around a huge open-world environment inspired by Old Wild stories. Explore and have fun driving your own way!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
